title: Want to trade T205 Cobb for E101 Wagner (throwing)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Want to trade T205 Cobb for E101 Wagner (throwing)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Alan U
Looking to trade T205 Cobb PSA 3 (see scan below, card has some wear on the upper left border) for a "nice" lower grade E101 Wagner (throwing)... PSA/SGC 2-3

Also interested in other mid-grade E101 HOFer's (especially, Lajoie, Bender-striped hat, Tinker)

In addition, looking for E101 commons Schlei & Boss Schmidt (low grade fine)

I have other less expensive cards to trade in addition to the Cobb.

-Alan
